description: Promotional offers for service to vehicles: .

Offer Origin.description: The type of company that originated the offers. For services like Oil, Brakes, Tires, this is likely a Service Center

Offer Description.description: A brief text description of the offer. This could be oil change, tire rotation, tune-up, maintenance, repairs, warranty extension, etc.

Offer Expiration.description: When does the promotional offer expire.

Offer Amount.description: What is the maintenance or repair service offer amount?.

Warranty.description: If there is a warranty being offered, how many miles and years.
